named-query.name: BC_FIND_COUNTRY_SUBDIVISIONS
named-query.query: SELECT subdivision FROM com.wakacommerce.profile.core.domain.CountrySubdivision subdivision ORDER BY subdivision.name

named-query.name: BC_FIND_SUBDIVISIONS_BY_COUNTRY_ABBREVIATION
named-query.query: SELECT subdivision FROM com.wakacommerce.profile.core.domain.CountrySubdivision subdivision WHERE subdivision.country.abbreviation = :countryAbbreviation ORDER BY subdivision.name

named-query.name: BC_FIND_SUBDIVISIONS_BY_COUNTRY_ABBREVIATION_AND_CATEGORY
named-query.query: SELECT subdivision FROM com.wakacommerce.profile.core.domain.CountrySubdivision subdivision WHERE subdivision.country.abbreviation = :countryAbbreviation AND subdivision.category.name = :category ORDER BY subdivision.name
